001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
005import jakarta.activation.DataHandler;
006import jakarta.activation.DataSource;
007import jakarta.activation.FileDataSource;
008import jakarta.mail.MessagingException;
009import jakarta.mail.Multipart;
010import jakarta.mail.Transport;
011import jakarta.mail.internet.*;
012
013import java.io.*;
014import java.time.LocalDateTime;
015import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
016import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
017import java.time.format.FormatStyle;
018import java.util.*;
019import java.util.jar.Attributes;
020import java.util.regex.Matcher;
021import java.util.regex.Pattern;
022import java.util.stream.Collectors;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025/**
026 * This class is used to submit assignments in CS410J.  The user
027 * specified his or her email address as well as the base directory
028 * for his/her source files on the command line.  The directory is
029 * searched recursively for files that are allowed to be submitted.
030 * Those files are
031 * placed in a zip file and emailed to the grader.  A confirmation
032 * email is sent to the submitter.
033 *
034 * More information about the JavaMail API can be found at:
035 *
036 * <a href="http://java.sun.com/products/javamail">
037 * http://java.sun.com/products/javamail</a>
038 *
039 * @author David Whitlock
040 * @since Fall 2000 (Refactored to use fewer static methods in Spring 2006)
041 */
042public class Submit extends EmailSender {
043
044  private static final PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(System.out, true);
045  private static final PrintWriter err = new PrintWriter(System.err, true);
046
047  /////////////////////  Instance Fields  //////////////////////////
048
049  /**
050   * The name of the project being submitted
051   */
052  private String projName = null;
053
054  /**
055   * The name of the user (student) submits the project
056   */
057  private String userName = null;
058
059  /**
060   * The submitter's email address
061   */
062  private String userEmail = null;
063
064  /**
065   * The submitter's user id
066   */
067  private String userId = null;
068
069  /**
070   * A comment describing the project
071   */
072  private String comment = null;
073
074  /**
075   * Should the execution of this program be logged?
076   */
077  private boolean debug = false;
078
079  /**
080   * Should the generated zip file be saved?
081   */
082  private boolean saveZip = false;
083
084  private boolean sendEmails = true;
085
086  /**
087   * The time at which the project was submitted
088   */
089  private LocalDateTime submitTime = null;
090
091  /**
092   * The names of the files to be submitted
093   */
094  private final Set<String> fileNames = new HashSet<>();
095
096  private boolean isSubmittingKoans = false;
097  private boolean sendReceipt = true;
098  private String studentXmlFileName;
099
100  ///////////////////////  Constructors  /////////////////////////
101
102  /**
103   * Creates a new <code>Submit</code> program
104   */
105  Submit() {
106
107  }
108

111  /**
112   * Sets the name of the SMTP server that is used to send emails
113   */
114  void setEmailServerHostName(String serverName) {
115    EmailSender.serverName = serverName;
116  }

118  /**
119   * Sets whether or not the progress of the submission should be logged.
120   */
121  public void setDebug(boolean debug) {
122    this.debug = debug;
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * Sets whether or not the zip file generated by the submission
127   * should be saved.
128   */
129  private void saveZip() {
130    this.saveZip = true;
131  }
132
133  private void doNotSendEmails() {
134    this.sendEmails = false;
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Sets the comment for this submission
139   */
140  private void setComment(String comment) {
141    this.comment = comment;
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Sets the name of project being submitted
146   */
147  void setProjectName(String projName) {
148    this.projName = projName;
149  }
150
151  /**
152   * Adds the file with the given name to the list of files to be
153   * submitted.
154   */
155  void addFile(String fileName) {
156    this.fileNames.add(fileName);
157  }
158
159  /**
160   * Validates the state of this submission
161   *
162   * @throws IllegalStateException If any state is incorrect or missing
163   */
164  private void validate() {
165    validateProjectName();
166
167    if (projName == null) {
168      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing project name");
169    }
170
171    validateStudentXmlFile();
172
173    if (userName == null) {
174      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing student name");
175    }
176
177    if (userId == null) {
178      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing login id");
179    }
180
181    if (isNineDigitStudentId(userId)) {
182      throw new IllegalStateException(loginIdShouldNotBeStudentId(userId));
183    }
184
185    if (looksLikeAnEmailAddress(userId)) {
186      throw new IllegalStateException(loginIdShouldNotBeEmailAddress(userId));
187    }
188
189    if (userEmail == null) {
190      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing email address");
191
192    } else {
193      // Make sure user's email is okay
194      try {
195        new InternetAddress(userEmail);
196
197      } catch (AddressException ex) {
198        String m = "Invalid email address: " + userEmail;
199        throw new IllegalStateException(m, ex);
200      }
201    }
202  }
203
204  private void validateStudentXmlFile() {
205    if (this.studentXmlFileName == null) {
206      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing Student XML File");
207    }
208
209    File studentXmlFile = new File(this.studentXmlFileName);
210    if (!studentXmlFile.exists()) {
211      throw new IllegalStateException("Student XML file \"" + studentXmlFile + "\" doesn't exist");
212    }
213
214    Student student;
215    try {
216      student = new XmlStudentParser(studentXmlFile).parseStudent();
217    } catch (ParserException | IOException ex) {
218      throw new IllegalStateException("Could not parse Student XML file \"" + studentXmlFile + "\"", ex);
219    }
220
221    setStudent(student);
222
223  }
224
225  @VisibleForTesting
226  void setStudent(Student student) {
227    this.userId = student.getId();
228    this.userName = student.getFullName();
229    this.userEmail = student.getEmail();
230  }
231
232  private String loginIdShouldNotBeEmailAddress(String userId) {
233    return "Your login id (" + userId + ") should not be an email address";
234  }
235
236  @VisibleForTesting
237  boolean looksLikeAnEmailAddress(String userId) {
238    return userId.contains("@");
239  }
240
241  @VisibleForTesting
242  boolean isNineDigitStudentId(String userId) {
243    return userId.matches("^[0-9]{9}$");
244  }
245
246  private String loginIdShouldNotBeStudentId(String userId) {
247    return "Your login id (" + userId + ") should not be your 9-digit student id";
248  }
249
250  @VisibleForTesting
251  void validateProjectName() {
252    List<String> validProjectNames = fetchListOfValidProjectNames();
253    if (!validProjectNames.contains(projName)) {
254      String message = "\"" + projName + "\" is not in the list of valid project names: " + validProjectNames;
255      throw new IllegalStateException(message);
256    }
257  }
258
259  private List<String> fetchListOfValidProjectNames() {
260    return fetchListOfStringsFromResource("project-names");
261  }
262
263  private List<String> fetchListOfStringsFromResource(String resourceName) {
264    InputStream stream = this.getClass().getResourceAsStream(resourceName);
265    if (stream == null) {
266      throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot load " + resourceName);
267    }
268
269    List<String> strings = new ArrayList<>();
270    try {
271
272      InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(stream);
273      BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(isr);
274      while (br.ready()) {
275        strings.add(br.readLine().trim());
276      }
277
278    } catch (IOException ex) {
279      err.println("** WARNING: Problems while reading " + resourceName + ": " + ex.getMessage());
280    }
281
282    return strings;
283  }
284
285  /**
286   * Submits the project to the grader
287   *
288   * @param verify Should the user be prompted to verify his submission?
289   * @return Whether or not the submission actually occurred
290   * @throws IllegalStateException If no source files were found
291   */
292  public boolean submit(boolean verify) throws IOException, MessagingException {
293    // Recursively search the source directory for .java files
294    Set<File> sourceFiles = searchForSourceFiles(fileNames);
295
296    db(sourceFiles.size() + " source files found");
297
298    if (sourceFiles.size() == 0) {
299      String s = "No source files were found.";
300      throw new IllegalStateException(s);
301    } else if (sourceFiles.size() < 3) {
302      String s = "Too few source files were submitted. Each project requires at least 3 files be" + 
303                 " submitted. You only submitted " + sourceFiles.size() + " files";
304      throw new IllegalStateException(s);
305    }
306
307    // Verify submission with user
308    if (verify && !verifySubmission(sourceFiles)) {
309      // User does not want to submit
310      return false;
311    }
312
313    // Timestamp
314    this.submitTime = LocalDateTime.now();
315
316    // Create a temporary zip file to hold the source files
317    File zipFile = makeZipFileWith(sourceFiles);
318
319    if (this.sendEmails) {
320      // Send the zip file as an email attachment to the TA
321      mailTA(zipFile, sourceFiles);
322
323      if (sendReceipt) {
324        mailReceipt(sourceFiles);
325      }
326    }
327
328    return true;
329  }
330
331  /**
332   * Prints debugging output.
333   */
334  private void db(String s) {
335    if (this.debug) {
336      err.println("++ " + s);
337    }
338  }
339
340  /**
341   * Searches for the files given on the command line.  Ignores files
342   * that do not end in .java, or that appear on the "no submit" list.
343   * Files must reside in a directory named
344   * edu/pdx/cs410J/<studentId>.
345   */
346  private Set<File> searchForSourceFiles(Set<String> fileNames) {
347    // Files should be sorted by name
348    SortedSet<File> files =
349      new TreeSet<>(Comparator.comparing(File::toString));
350    populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(files, fileNames);
351
352    files.removeIf((file) -> !canBeSubmitted(file));
353
354    return files;
355  }
356
357  private void populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(SortedSet<File> allFiles, Set<String> fileNames) {
358    populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(allFiles, fileNames.stream().map(name -> new File(name).getAbsoluteFile()));
359  }
360
361  private void populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(SortedSet<File> allFiles, Stream<File> files) {
362    files.forEach((file) -> {
363      if (file.isDirectory()) {
364        populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(allFiles, Arrays.stream(Objects.requireNonNull(file.listFiles())));
365
366      } else {
367        allFiles.add(file);
368      }
369    });
370
371  }
372
373  protected boolean canBeSubmitted(File file) {
374    if (!fileExists(file)) {
375      return false;
376    }
377
378    // Is the file on the "no submit" list?
379    List<String> noSubmit = fetchListOfFilesThatCanNotBeSubmitted();
380    String name = file.getName();
381    if (noSubmit.contains(name)) {
382      err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
383        " because it is on the \"no submit\" list");
384      return false;
385    }
386
387    // Verify that file is in the correct directory.
388    if (isInAKoansDirectory(file)) {
389      if (!file.getName().endsWith(".java")) {
390        err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
391          " because does end in \".java\"");
392        return false;
393      }
394
395    } else {
396      if (!isInMavenProjectDirectory(file)) {
397        err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
398          ": it does not reside in a Maven project in a directory named " +
399          "edu" + File.separator + "pdx" + File.separator +
400          "cs410J" + File.separator + userId + " (or in one of the koans directories)");
401        return false;
402      }
403
404      // Does the file name end in .java?
405      if (!canFileBeSubmitted(file)) {
406        String fileName = file.getName();
407        int index = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
408        if (index < 0) {
409          err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
410            " because it does not have an extension.");
411
412        } else {
413          String fileExtension = fileName.substring(index);
414          err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
415            " because files ending in " + fileExtension +
416            " are not supposed to be in that directory");
417        }
418        return false;
419      }
420    }
421    return true;
422  }
423
424  @VisibleForTesting
425  static boolean canFileBeSubmitted(File file) {
426    String path = file.getPath();
427
428    if (path.matches(".*src/.*/java/.*")) {
429      return path.endsWith(".java");
430
431    } else if (path.matches(".*src/.*/javadoc/.*")) {
432      return path.endsWith(".html");
433
434    } else if (path.matches(".*src/.*/resources/.*")) {
435      return path.endsWith(".xml") || path.endsWith(".txt");
436
437    } else {
438      return false;
439    }
440  }
441
442  boolean fileExists(File file) {
443    if (!file.exists()) {
444      err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
445        " because it does not exist");
446      return false;
447    }
448    return true;
449  }
450
451  private boolean isInAKoansDirectory(File file) {
452    boolean isInAKoansDirectory = hasParentDirectories(file, "beginner") ||
453      hasParentDirectories(file, "intermediate") ||
454      hasParentDirectories(file, "advanced") ||
455      hasParentDirectories(file, "java7") ||
456      hasParentDirectories(file, "java8");
457    if (isInAKoansDirectory) {
458      this.isSubmittingKoans = true;
459      db(file + " is in a koans directory");
460    }
461    return isInAKoansDirectory;
462  }
463
464  @VisibleForTesting
465  boolean isInMavenProjectDirectory(File file) {
466    boolean isInMavenProjectDirectory = hasParentDirectories(file, userId, "cs410J", "pdx", "edu", "java|javadoc|resources", "main|test|it", "src");
467    if (isInMavenProjectDirectory) {
468      db(file + " is in the edu/pdx/cs410J directory");
469    }
470    return isInMavenProjectDirectory;
471  }
472
473  private boolean hasParentDirectories(File file, String... parentDirectoryNames) {
474    File parent = file.getParentFile();
475
476    // Skip over subpackages
477    while (parent != null && !parent.getName().equals(parentDirectoryNames[0])) {
478      parent = parent.getParentFile();
479    }
480
481    for (String parentDirectoryName : parentDirectoryNames) {
482      if (parent == null || !parent.getName().matches(parentDirectoryName)) {
483        return false;
484
485      } else {
486        parent = parent.getParentFile();
487      }
488    }
489
490    return true;
491  }
492
493  private List<String> fetchListOfFilesThatCanNotBeSubmitted() {
494    return fetchListOfStringsFromResource("no-submit");
495  }
496
497  /**
498   * Prints a summary of what is about to be submitted and prompts the
499   * user to verify that it is correct.
500   *
501   * @return <code>true</code> if the user wants to submit
502   */
503  private boolean verifySubmission(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
504    // Print out what is going to be submitted
505    out.print("\n" + userName);
506    out.print("'s submission for ");
507    out.println(projName);
508
509    for (File file : sourceFiles) {
510      out.println("  " + file);
511    }
512
513    if (comment != null) {
514      out.println("\nComment: " + comment + "\n\n");
515    }
516
517    out.println("A receipt will be sent to: " + userEmail + "\n");
518
519    warnIfMainProjectClassIsNotSubmitted(sourceFiles);
520
521    warnIfTestClassesAreNotSubmitted(sourceFiles);
522
523    return doesUserWantToSubmit();
524  }
525
526  protected void warnIfMainProjectClassIsNotSubmitted(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
527    boolean wasMainProjectClassSubmitted = sourceFiles.stream().anyMatch((f) -> f.getName().contains(this.projName));
528    if (!wasMainProjectClassSubmitted && !this.isSubmittingKoans) {
529      String mainProjectClassName = this.projName + ".java";
530      out.println("*** WARNING: You are submitting " + this.projName +
531        ", but did not include " + mainProjectClassName + ".\n" +
532        "    You might want to check the name of the project or the files you are submitting.\n");
533    }
534  }
535
536  protected void warnIfTestClassesAreNotSubmitted(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
537    boolean wereTestClassessSubmitted = submittedTestClasses(sourceFiles);
538    if (!wereTestClassessSubmitted && !this.isSubmittingKoans) {
539      out.println("*** WARNING: You are not submitting a \"test\" directory.\n" +
540        "    Your unit tests are executed as part of the grading of your project.\n");
541    }
542  }
543
544  @VisibleForTesting
545  static boolean submittedTestClasses(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
546    return sourceFiles.stream().anyMatch((f) -> f.getPath().contains("test"));
547  }
548
549  private boolean doesUserWantToSubmit() {
550    InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(System.in);
551    BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(isr);
552
553    while (true) {
554      out.print("Do you wish to continue with the submission? (yes/no) ");
555      out.flush();
556
557      try {
558        String line = in.readLine().trim();
559        switch (line) {
560          case "yes":
561            return true;
562
563          case "no":
564            return false;
565
566          default:
567            err.println("** Please enter yes or no");
568            break;
569        }
570
571      } catch (IOException ex) {
572        err.println("** Exception while reading from System.in: " + ex);
573      }
574    }
575  }
576
577  /**
578   * Returns the name of a <code>File</code> relative to the source
579   * directory.
580   */
581  protected String getZipEntryNameFor(File file) {
582    if (isSubmittingKoans) {
583      return file.getParentFile().getName() + "/" + file.getName();
584
585    } else {
586      // We already know that the file is in the correct directory
587      return getZipEntryNameFor(file.getPath());
588    }
589  }
590
591  @VisibleForTesting
592  static String getZipEntryNameFor(String filePath) {
593    Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(".*/src/(main|test|it)/(java|javadoc|resources)/edu/pdx/cs410J/(.*)");
594    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(filePath);
595
596    if (matcher.matches()) {
597      return "src/" + matcher.group(1) + "/" + matcher.group(2) + "/edu/pdx/cs410J/" + matcher.group(3);
598    } else {
599      throw new IllegalStateException("Can't extract zip entry name for " + filePath);
600    }
601  }
602
603  /**
604   * Creates a Zip file that contains the source files.  The Zip File
605   * is temporary and is deleted when the program exits.
606   */
607  private File makeZipFileWith(Set<File> sourceFiles) throws IOException {
608    String zipFileName = userName.replace(' ', '_') + "-TEMP";
609    File zipFile = File.createTempFile(zipFileName, ".zip");
610    if (!saveZip) {
611      zipFile.deleteOnExit();
612
613    } else {
614      out.println("Saving temporary Zip file: " + zipFile);
615    }
616
617    db("Created Zip file: " + zipFile);
618
619    Map<File, String> sourceFilesWithNames =
620      sourceFiles.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(file -> file, this::getZipEntryNameFor));
621
622    new ZipFileOfFilesMaker(sourceFilesWithNames, zipFile, getManifestEntries()).makeZipFile();
623    return zipFile;
624  }
625
626  private Map<Attributes.Name, String> getManifestEntries() {
627    Map<Attributes.Name, String> manifestEntries = new HashMap<>();
628    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.USER_NAME, userName);
629    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.USER_ID, userId);
630    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.USER_EMAIL, userEmail);
631    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.PROJECT_NAME, projName);
632    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.SUBMISSION_COMMENT, comment);
633    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.SUBMISSION_TIME, ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(submitTime));
634    return manifestEntries;
635  }
636
637  /**
638   * Sends the Zip file to the TA as a MIME attachment.  Also includes
639   * a textual summary of the contents of the Zip file.
640   */
641  private void mailTA(File zipFile, Set<File> sourceFiles) throws MessagingException {
642    MimeMessage message =
643      newEmailTo(newEmailSession(debug), TA_EMAIL)
644        .from(userEmail, userName)
645        .withSubject("CS410J-SUBMIT " + userName + "'s " + projName)
646        .createMessage();
647
648    MimeBodyPart textPart = createTextPartOfTAEmail(sourceFiles);
649    MimeBodyPart filePart = createZipAttachment(zipFile);
650
651    Multipart mp = new MimeMultipart();
652    mp.addBodyPart(textPart);
653    mp.addBodyPart(filePart);
654
655    message.setContent(mp);
656
657    out.println("Submitting project to Grader");
658
659    Transport.send(message);
660  }
661
662  private MimeBodyPart createZipAttachment(File zipFile) throws MessagingException {
663    // Now attach the Zip file
664    DataSource ds = new FileDataSource(zipFile) {
665      @Override
666      public String getContentType() {
667        return "application/zip";
668      }
669    };
670    DataHandler dh = new DataHandler(ds);
671    MimeBodyPart filePart = new MimeBodyPart();
672
673    String zipFileTitle = userName.replace(' ', '_') + ".zip";
674
675    filePart.setDataHandler(dh);
676    filePart.setFileName(zipFileTitle);
677    filePart.setDescription(userName + "'s " + projName);
678
679    return filePart;
680  }
681
682  private MimeBodyPart createTextPartOfTAEmail(Set<File> sourceFiles) throws MessagingException {
683    // Create the text portion of the message
684    StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
685    text.append("Student name: ").append(userName).append(" (").append(userEmail).append(")\n");
686    text.append("Project name: ").append(projName).append("\n");
687    text.append("Submitted on: ").append(humanReadableSubmitDate()).append("\n");
688    if (comment != null) {
689      text.append("\nComment: ").append(comment).append("\n\n");
690    }
691    text.append("Contents:\n");
692
693    for (File file : sourceFiles) {
694      text.append("  ").append(getZipEntryNameFor(file)).append("\n");
695    }
696    text.append("\n\n");
697
698    MimeBodyPart textPart = new MimeBodyPart();
699    textPart.setContent(text.toString(), "text/plain");
700
701    // Try not to display text as separate attachment
702    textPart.setDisposition("inline");
703    return textPart;
704  }
705
706  private String humanReadableSubmitDate() {
707    return submitTime.format(DateTimeFormatter.ofLocalizedDateTime(FormatStyle.FULL, FormatStyle.MEDIUM));
708  }
709
710  /**
711   * Sends a email to the user as a receipt of the submission.
712   */
713  private void mailReceipt(Set<File> sourceFiles) throws MessagingException {
714    String subject = "CS410J " + projName + " submission";
715    InternetAddress email = newInternetAddress(this.userEmail, this.userName);
716    MimeMessage message =
717      newEmailTo(newEmailSession(debug), email)
718        .from(TA_EMAIL)
719        .replyTo(DAVE_EMAIL)
720        .withSubject(subject)
721        .createMessage();
722
723    // Create the contents of the message
724    StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
725    text.append("On ").append(humanReadableSubmitDate()).append("\n");
726    text.append(userName).append(" (").append(userEmail).append(")\n");
727    text.append("submitted the following files for ").append(projName).append(":\n");
728
729    for (File file : sourceFiles) {
730      text.append("  ").append(file.getAbsolutePath()).append("\n");
731    }
732
733    if (comment != null) {
734      text.append("\nComment: ").append(comment).append("\n\n");
735    }
736
737    text.append("\n\n");
738    text.append("Have a nice day.");
739
740    // Add the text to the message and send it
741    message.setText(text.toString());
742    message.setDisposition("inline");
743
744    out.println("Sending receipt to you at " + userEmail);
745
746    Transport.send(message);
747  }
748
749  /////////////////////////  Main Program  ///////////////////////////
750
751  /**
752   * Prints usage information about this program.
753   */
754  protected void usage(String message) {
755    err.println("\n** " + message + "\n");
756    err.println("usage: java " + this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " [options] args file+");
757    err.println("  args are (in this order):");
758    err.println("    project            What project is being submitted (Project1, Project2, etc.)");
759    err.println("    studentXmlFile     XML file with info about who is submitting the project");
760    err.println("    srcDirectory       Directory containing source code to submit");
761    err.println("  options are (options may appear in any order):");
762    err.println("    -savezip           Saves temporary Zip file");
763    err.println("    -nosend            Generates zip file, but does not send emails");
764    err.println("    -smtp serverName   Name of SMTP server");
765    err.println("    -verbose           Log debugging output");
766    err.println("    -comment comment   Info for the Grader");
767    err.println("");
768    err.println("Submits Java source code to the CS410J grader.");
769    System.exit(1);
770  }
771
772  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, MessagingException {
773    Submit submit = new Submit();
774    submit.parseCommandLineAndSubmit(args);
775  }
776
777  /**
778   * Parses the command line, finds the source files, prompts the user
779   * to verify whether or not the settings are correct, and then sends
780   * an email to the Grader.
781   */
782  void parseCommandLineAndSubmit(String[] args) throws IOException, MessagingException {
783    // Parse the command line
784    for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
785      // Check for options first
786      if (args[i].equals("-smtp")) {
787        if (++i >= args.length) {
788          usage("No SMTP server specified");
789        }
790
791        this.setEmailServerHostName(args[i]);
792
793      } else if (args[i].equals("-verbose")) {
794        this.setDebug(true);
795
796      } else if (args[i].equals("-savezip")) {
797        this.saveZip();
798
799      } else if (args[i].equals("-nosend")) {
800        this.doNotSendEmails();
801
802      } else if (args[i].equals("-comment")) {
803        if (++i >= args.length) {
804          usage("No comment specified");
805        }
806
807        this.setComment(args[i]);
808
809      } else if (this.projName == null) {
810        this.setProjectName(args[i]);
811
812      } else if (this.studentXmlFileName == null) {
813        this.studentXmlFileName = args[i];
814
815      } else {
816        // The name of a source file
817        this.addFile(args[i]);
818      }
819    }
820
821    boolean submitted;
822
823    try {
824      // Make sure that user entered enough information
825      this.validate();
826
827      this.db("Command line successfully parsed.");
828
829      submitted = this.submit(true);
830
831    } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
832      usage(ex.getMessage());
833      return;
834    }
835
836    // All done.
837    if (submitted) {
838      out.println(this.projName + " submitted successfully.  Thank you.");
839
840    } else {
841      out.println(this.projName + " not submitted.");
842    }
843  }
844
845  void setSendReceipt(boolean sendReceipt) {
846    this.sendReceipt = sendReceipt;
847
848  }
849
850  static class ManifestAttributes {
851
852    static final Attributes.Name USER_NAME = new Attributes.Name("Submitter-User-Name");
853    static final Attributes.Name USER_ID = new Attributes.Name("Submitter-User-Id");
854    static final Attributes.Name USER_EMAIL = new Attributes.Name("Submitter-Email");
855    static final Attributes.Name PROJECT_NAME = new Attributes.Name("Project-Name");
856    static final Attributes.Name SUBMISSION_TIME = new Attributes.Name("Submission-Time");
857    static final Attributes.Name SUBMISSION_COMMENT = new Attributes.Name("Submission-Comment");
858
859    private static final DateTimeFormatter LEGACY_DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MMM-dd HH:mm:ss");
860    private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE_TIME;
861
862    static String formatSubmissionTime(LocalDateTime submitTime) {
863      return submitTime.format(DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
864    }
865
866    static LocalDateTime parseSubmissionTime(String string) {
867      try {
868        return LocalDateTime.parse(string, DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
869
870      } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
871        return LocalDateTime.parse(string, LEGACY_DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
872      }
873    }
874  }
875
876}
